metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39883 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Improper authorization checks in all versions of GitLab EE starting from13.11 before 14.1.7, all versions starting from 14.2 before 14.2.5, and allversions starting from 14.3 before 14.3.1 allows subgroup members to seeepics from all parent subgroups.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
